scenes.description: Opening sequence of the song 'Hai-kei Doppelganger' featuring Hakos Baelz and her shadow self in a fiery arena.
Instrumental transition showing a black rose in a dark void and a red orb descending into it.
Main performance of 'Hai-kei Doppelganger' by Hakos Baelz and her shadow version.

subtitles.original: lost lost lost! 消し去りたい
subtitles.english: lost lost lost! I want to erase it

subtitles.original: 消し去りたい 掻き消す爆発音
subtitles.english: I want to erase it, the drowning out explosion

subtitles.original: Vielen Sperre Lost! Deckun Hilphe Halt!
subtitles.english: Vielen Sperre Lost! Deckun Hilphe Halt!

subtitles.english: Vielen Sperre Lost! Deckun Hilphe Halt!

subtitles.original: Awake
subtitles.english: Awake

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger

subtitles.original: どうもこんにちは君の分身です
subtitles.english: Hello, I'm your double

subtitles.original: 何の冗談か眼を擦ってみる
subtitles.english: I rub my eyes, thinking it's some kind of joke

subtitles.original: 影が二つ伸びて　そしてまたまじわる
subtitles.english: Two shadows stretch out and meet again

subtitles.original: もう一人自分がいたならと願いました
subtitles.english: I wished there were another me

subtitles.original: そんな深層心理が僕を呼んだのさ
subtitles.english: That deep psychology called out to me

subtitles.original: それを望むのも　等しく全ての罪
subtitles.english: Wishing for that is also equally a sin

subtitles.original: 過程如何で結果を欲しがる無意味無意味な代償
subtitles.english:
Wanting results regardless of the process,
a meaningless, meaningless price

subtitles.original: ねぇこんな素晴らしいことがあるんだいいだろ
subtitles.english: Hey, something this wonderful is happening, isn't it great?

subtitles.original: ええやりますやります何でもやります 僕は君の分身です
subtitles.english: Yes, I'll do it, I'll do anything. I'm your double

subtitles.original: 罪はライアー　メサイアは　You
subtitles.english: The sin is a liar, the messiah is you

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　君は誰　君は誰
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you? Who are you?

subtitles.original: あぁ混濁の末として　僕が誰
subtitles.english: Ah, as a result of the confusion, who am I?

subtitles.original: ねぇ　曝け出さない自意識証明の虚構なんてどこにもない
subtitles.english:
Hey, there's no such thing as a fiction of
unexposed self-conscious proof

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　あれは誰　あれは君
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who is that? That is you

subtitles.original: 蝕まれた存在に　世界は気付かれへん
subtitles.english: The world won't notice your eroded existence

subtitles.original: 何もない　痛みもない
subtitles.english: There's nothing, no pain

subtitles.original: 一石の人間が　狂った正解を染め上げてるん　パッパ
subtitles.english: A single human is staining the crazy correct answer, pa-pa

subtitles.original: どうも様子がおかしい　月曜日
subtitles.english: Something seems wrong on Monday

subtitles.original: 一つずつ崩れゆく　辻褄が
subtitles.english: The coherence is crumbling one by one

subtitles.original: 僕は誰にする？　お前は誰だと
subtitles.english: Who should I be? Who are you?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って知らないその知りもしない言葉
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, I don't know those words I've never heard

subtitles.original: そうやっていつの間にやら影と溶けゆく
subtitles.english: Just like that, before I know it, I'm melting into the shadow

subtitles.original: 僕はなんだろう　独存罪介して
subtitles.english: What am I? Through the sin of sole existence

subtitles.original: あいにく様あちらはあちらで随分心地よくて
subtitles.english: Sorry to say, but that side over there is quite comfortable

subtitles.original: もうあなたの居場所がここにないこと分かってるんでしょ
subtitles.english: You already know there's no place for you here, right?

subtitles.original: ねぇ　奪ったんだろ　バーバイだろう　今度はお前の番だ
subtitles.english: Hey, you took it, didn't you? Bye-bye, now it's your turn

subtitles.original: 罪はライアー　イネヴァーは　You
subtitles.english: The sin is a liar, the invader is you

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　君は誰　君は誰
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who are you? Who are you?

subtitles.original: あぁ混濁の末として　僕が誰
subtitles.english: Ah, as a result of the confusion, who am I?

subtitles.original: 増すはずの存在の命の椅子は一つだけ
subtitles.english:
There's only one seat for the life of an
existence that should increase

subtitles.original: 拝啓ドッペルゲンガー　あれは誰　あれは君
subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who is that? That is you

subtitles.original: 零れ出した一粒が　渇き果てるまで
subtitles.english: Until the single drop that spilled out dries up

subtitles.original: 誰もいない　何でもいい
subtitles.english: No one is here, anything is fine

subtitles.original: 普通を装う　狂った世界が染め上げてるん　パッパ
subtitles.english: Pretending to be normal, the crazy world is staining, pa-pa

subtitles.original: 一人ずつ続き　響く五芒星の連鎖

subtitles.original: 僕のほうがちゃんと君を生きてやるから

subtitles.original: 君も次の誰かちゃんと救わなくちゃ
subtitles.english: So you have to make sure to save the next person too

subtitles.original: もう分かってんだろ何をすればいいかさ
subtitles.english: You already know what you have to do, right?

subtitles.original: 遠く誰か僕に奇跡をくれ
subtitles.english: Someone far away, give me a miracle

subtitles.english: Dear Doppelganger, who is that? That is me
